column2: On that day they dined early at the Small House, as they had been in the habit of doing since the packing had commenced.

column2: And after dinner Mrs. Dale went through the gardens, up to the other house, with a written note in her hand.

column2: In that note she had told Lady Julia, with many protestations of gratitude, that Lily was unable to go out so soon after her illness, and that she herself was obliged to stay with Lily.
